Entries.MobilePhoneGreeting: Hey, hotstuff. How are you holding up?
Entries.MobilePhoneReminisce: Well someone's feeling nostalgic today, aren't we?
Entries.MobilePhoneGoodBye: See ya, @! You know where to reach me if you want to chat.

Entries.MobilePhoneGreeting: Hey, cupcake. Are you missing my voice that much, dear?
Entries.MobilePhoneReminisce: How did you know my favorite activity is thinking of time spent with you?
Entries.MobilePhoneGoodBye: Talk to you later, darling. Know I'm a ring away if you need me, aight?

Entries.MobilePhoneGreeting: Why hello, you've reached the office of the luckiest married man alive. How can I help, hotstuff?
Entries.MobilePhoneReminisce: Mmm, nothing like going over my favorite memories with you. What would you like to talk about, lover?
Entries.MobilePhoneGoodBye: I'm now going to go ahead and kiss the phone until you hang up on me. Mwah, mwah mw-
